name: Radiation Station
description:
Radiation is killing you but it's also giving you powers! Can you manage the levels long enough to save everyone and escape the facility?

CONTROLS
WASD to move (S to drop down through platforms)
Spacebar to shoot zombies and doors (and to confirm character select at the beginning)

POWERS
The radiation bar at the top left gradually fills up. The red notches indicate the three power levels. Pills will decrease radiation. If the radiation bar maxes out, you die!

first level: shooting
second level: jumping higher
third level: invulnerability - zombies won't be able to hit you but you don't have long, so you need to find a pill!

CREDITS
art and programming - daebak
art, music and level design - okienoki
alarm sound effect by onderwish from freesound.org 

Game made from scratch for Mini Jam 76: Radiation
